text: Egha me a inigha Atensɨn garir gumazir dapanibar tongɨn ghua me mɨghsɨamɨn Areopagus uari akuvagha iti. Egha me kamaghɨn Pol mɨgei, “Nɨ nɨghnɨzir e fomɨra tong oraghizir puvatɨzibav gei. E dar mɨngarim gɨfoghasa ifonge. Kamaghɨn e foghasa, kar nɨghnɨzir igiar manam, nɨ an gumazibar sure gami. Nɨ e mɨkɨm.”
